snippet: Brazil coach Luiz Felipe Scolari apologized to fans for failing to lead the host to the World Cup final, saying the "catastrophic" defeat to Germany on Tuesday marked the "worst day" of his professional life....

headline.print_headline: Scolari Apologizes for Brazil's World Cup Failure
headline.main: Scolari Apologizes for Brazil's World Cup Failure

lead_paragraph: Brazil coach Luiz Felipe Scolari apologized to fans for failing to lead the host to the World Cup final, saying the "catastrophic" defeat to Germany on Tuesday marked the "worst day" of his professional life.
